titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4505) to authorize appropriations to the Department of Energy for civilian research and development programs for fiscal year 1989.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-654.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4505 (energy programs funding).
